title: In Our Dreams
description: Amanda Fredrick had dreamt of Tyler all her life. Tyler was quite literally in her dreams almost every night since as far back as she could remember. When Amanda’s parents decide to move the summer before her senior year, she thinks that things can’t get much worse. That’s when Tyler disappears from her dreams. What Amanda doesn’t know is that the reason Tyler is no longer part of her dreams is that she has just moved into the town where he lives.
author: Lynn Leite
